title: Darkness Eternal
description:
For the Guardians of Eternity, battle is a way of life—whether the plight of their world is at stake, or the fate of their heart…
 After being held captive by one vampire for four centuries, Kata had no intention of taking another one to the underworld with her. Yet even in the pits of Hell, there’s no ignoring the intoxicating desire awakened by Uriel’s touch…Previously published in Supernatural.32,833 WordsDON’T MISS ALEXANDRA IVY’S NEW SERIES, THE SENTINELS!
author: Alexandra Ivy
